**Request for Proposal: Informatics Professional Services for Natural Resources Canada**
=====================================================================================================**( Kensington_loc)

**Notice of Proposed Procurement**
------------------------------------

The Government of Canada hereby notifies the public of its intention to award a contract to a qualified Contractor for the provision of Informatics Professional Services.

**Contracting Entity**
----------------------

* Name: Natural Resources Canada
* Address: 580 Booth Street, Ottawa, ON K1A 0E4 Canada

**Project Overview**
--------------------

Natural Resources Canada requires services to support the development and implementation of a new system for the Office of Energy Efficiency (OEE), as well as expertise to streamline and improve the system post-launch.

**Scope of Work**
-----------------

The successful Contractor will provide the following services:

* Support the development and implementation of the new system for OEE
* Provide expertise to streamline and improve the system post-launch
* Collaborate with NRCan stakeholders to ensure successful project delivery

**Eligibility Criteria**
-------------------------

* Submission of a Proposal that addresses all evaluation criteria
* Proof of relevant experience in informatics professional services
* Proof of business registry and valid business license

**Evaluation Criteria**
------------------------

* Proposal content and clarity (15% weight)
* Personal and/or team qualifications and experience (30% weight)
* Evidence of relevant expertise in the field of informatics (20% weight)
* Past performance record (35% weight)

**Proposal Submission**
-----------------------

Proposals must be submitted electronically through the Government of Canada's Buy and Sell website.

**Important Dates**
-------------------

* Proposal Submission deadline: February 6, 2023, at 14:00 EST
* Tender closing date and time: February 6, 2023, at 14:00 EST

**Contact Information**
----------------------

Raymond Thai, Contracting Officer
Natural Resources Canada
(613) 956-6607
raymond.thai@NRCan-RNCan.gc.ca

Please note that the submission deadline has **already passed**, and this tender has expired. Any proposal submissions will not be considered. However, for future reference, the above information serves as a template for future tenders.
